verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy, you are worthy
Much more worthy than I know
I cannot imagine
Just how glorious you are

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
And I cannot begin to tell
How deep a love You bring
O Lord, my ears had heard of You
But now my eyes have seen

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are worthy
You are worthy
You are worthy
You are worthy to be praised
Forever and a day

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory, I give glory
To the One who saved my soul
You found me and You freed me
From the shame that was my own

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Well sing an anthem of the highest praise
Well sing an anthem of Your glorious name
